channel.title: Roblox on AVX's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Roblox on AVX's Blog

item.title: Defeating Roblox's Import Protection
item.description: Introduction Roblox is a popular online game with an ever-growing player base. Due to its popularity, the game’s engineers require around-the-clock action to strategize new methods to thwart an attacker’s ability to analyse the behaviour of the game’s vital components. For an attacker, a trivial piece of the puzzle is to understand how the game operates. One of the many ways to achieve this is to examine the imports used within the process and perform further analysis based off the gathered results.
